projects.title: REACT + FIREBASE: Mock Social Media
projects.description: A web app connected to the CountriesAPI which supplies the application with data about countries from around the world. The app can filter by region or search term, has mobile and desktop layouts, and both a light and dark theme

projects.title: REACT + REST API: Countries Info
projects.description: A web app connected to the CountriesAPI which supplies the application with data about countries from around the world. The app can filter by region or search term, has mobile and desktop layouts, and both a light and dark theme
